tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
This may be long review, Hope its worth reading.
I am from Hyderabad and had plans to go to hometown for delivery. so, for the first two trimesters we needed a gynic. We ended up with Prabhjot. 

Trust me, At the end of my second trimester i forced my parents to come to Mumbai because i felt more comfortable and safe with Prabhjot.

First of all she is the best doctor i met till now, Why?
1. She is good listener, and explains everything in detail.
2. She treated me like a friend with in 2-3 visits, and she remembered all my records. Every time we felt like we are going to meet a friend.
3. Best thing is, She responded for all my messages and calls with smile. Trust me i had hundreds of silly doubts, but i got answers for all with smile.
4. Available all the time. She use to ask my permission to go on vacation. One can never expect this from a doc.
5.  It was normal delivery!!. no one in my family believed it because i was considered as unfit for normal delivery :).
6. Delivery counselling was very helpful. Being a biology/pharmacy student i could understand lot of it. 

My baby is 4 months old now. He is doing great.

I am very thankful to Prabhjot for her help in my most memorable pregnancy period. I recommend her!!

Alekhya & Chandra
reply_text: Thanku for ur overwhelming feedback alekhya nd chandra. U both r also one of my favourite patients. God bless to the little angel.

tags: Wait time,
review:
Doctor was unavailable for more than 45 minutes from appointment time. The Staff was not clear and misguided on wait time. We could not meet the doctor at all.

My mother 73 years old could not wait for an seemingly long time due to COVID related risks prevailing in our area.

I would recommend the staff and the doctor maintain some transparency and proactive communication with patients who are waiting for consultation.

If the staff could have informed us yesterday via a phone call to come later as doctor was unavailable it would have saved us a lot of inconvenience.

Thanks

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
*** ******** ********* ** *** ** *** **** ****** *She explains things in simple words that a lay man can also understand it easily.She is so friendly that one could easily share their  health related problems with her without any Hesitation. When my wife was pregnant from First Month onwards  we  started visiting  Dr Prabjjot's clinic  and  she took care of  my Wife so nicely that we never faced any problem till 9th Month.On Expected delivery date my wife didn't get any labour pain Most of our friends and relatives said that Doctor will go  for  C-Section but Dr.Prabhjot Manchanda  tried hard and  it was normal delivery .All thanks to Dr. Prabhjot.
Regards,Bunty  Makhija

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I’ve been visiting Dr. Prabhjoth a lot of times, *** ** ***** ************* *** * ****** ******* ************** I really appreciate her efforts, patience and friendliness towards all her patients. She had a lot patience to listen to each and every doubts I had in my mind and she also never hesitated to solve my irrelevant doubts too. She understands your problems carefully and I must say, her diagnosis is really remarkable and treatment is highly effective. She is one of the most sincere and honest doctor, I would never hesitate to recommend her to anyone!

review: The doctor after taking down brief symptoms and a quick check up, ******** announced that I have Herpes. No detailed explanation was given of the condition, just a list of medications and a 15 minute talk on weight loss for some reason. I decided to visit another doctor for a second consultation *** ***** *** **** * *** * ****** ********* *** *** ****** ***** **** ******* ** ********* ********** ** ********* *** ********* ** **** ******** *********** ******** ** *** ****** ** ********** **** ********* ****** ***** ** ***** *** ** *** **** ********** ****** ***** would not visit again.

review: i had visited this doctor with the problem of pain in the left breast and surrounding areashe did asked me about my periods and when i said it's one day gone than the expected date, she asked me do a pregnancy test.( her compounder hurriedly put a pregnancy kit in my hand -(which she brought from pharmacy within a clinic). I even told her that my periods sometimes goes late by 2/3. * *** ********* ** ********* *** ** ******** **** ** **** **** * *** * ****** *** ******* * still i went ahead and did the test. They charged us 85 Rs. for the kit. ( Though Rs. 65 was written on the kit.) when asked,  20Rs. for the plastic bottle was the answer😏later when the test was negative, she did breast examination and suggested few medicines. but those medicines were not available with most of the chemists **** ***** ** **********The compounder said they are only sold in pharmacy of the clinic.which means we have to buy medicines from them only ** ****** ******
